text: Blanch the Brussels sprouts. Place them briefly in a bowl of hot, salted boiling water. Place the blanched Brussels sprouts in the butter in a heavy-based saucepan.  Cover them with vegetable stock. Allow to simmer for 20 to 30 minutes. Cook the onions in a frying pan until golden in colour. Add the chestnuts and Brussels sprouts. Season to taste. Add some freshly grated nutmeg. Allow to simmer together for 5 more minutes over low heat. Place the lid over the pan. Remove from the pan. Serve hot.
